titleStmt.title: A Full account of the situation, former state and late siege of Stetin being a summary relation of all the particular actions perform'd both within the city and in the camp of His Highness the Elector of Brandenburgh / as it was delivered in sundry letters from credible persons of eminent quality in London.

A Full account of the situation, former state and late siege of Stetin being a summary relation of all the particular actions perform'd both within the city and in the camp of His Highness the Elector of Brandenburgh / as it was delivered in sundry letters from credible persons of eminent quality in London.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
